name: Valchemy
description:
• Brew potions.
  • Throw them at enemies.
  • Or throw them at yourself?
  • No other weapons or attacks of any kind.
  • Find and conserve ingredients.
  • Experiment to discover all the recipes.
  • Semi-randomized dungeons.
  • Death is not permanent, carry your potion-crafting knowledge into the next delve.

Made in 10 Days for JamCraft4.
